p: To find a potential therapy for SARS‐CoV‐2, a concrete understanding of potential drug targets is essential. Herein, we revisited a comprehensive list of SARS‐CoV‐2‐directed targets (M pro, PLpro, RdRp, spike protein, helicase, envelop protein) and host‐directed targets (ACE2, TMPRSS2, and immune system) that might hold promise for the development of potential therapy against SARS‐CoV‐2 infections (Figure 2).
